name: Men of War: Assault Squad 2
summary: Men of War: Assault Squad 2 features new single player style skirmish modes that take players from extreme tank combat to deadly sniper stealth missions. Commanders can now faceoff against opponents on various new multiplayer 1v1 – 4v4 maps.
info:
• 中文名: 战争之人：突击小队2
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RTS
  • 发行日期: 2014-05-15
  • 售价: $29.99 USD
  • 官方网站: http://www.menofwargame.com/
  • 开发: Digitalmindsoft
  • 发行: 1C Company
